name: Telegram Doge UserBot
description: Doge UserBot: is an excellent assistant telethon based bot that makes Telegram easy and fun with its fastest setup and modular structure.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

STRING_SESSION.description: Go to https://repl.it/@DogeUserBot/DogeString or paste the ### code into a program like termux, terminal, run it and paste the code you get here.

TG_BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at https://t.me/BotFather and get the username of your bot,

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at https://t.me/BotFather and get the token of your bot. Worth it. Get it.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Please don't steal!

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the Heroku app name you specified above here. It helps to keep Doge up to date.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Required for installation and updates. Recommend don't change it.

DOGELANG.description: Which language should the Doge speak? Available languages: Turkish(tr), English(en)

TZ.description: Required for correct time on autopic/get time. Write your time zone location closest to your current location in English. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: (Optional) Set this one with only one the symbol to use it before your command to run like . , ! ' `

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Heroku.
